code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DeleteButton=function DeleteButton(props){var pirateId=props.pirateId,successCall=props.successCall;var deletePirate=function deletePirate(e){axios.delete('http://localhost:8000/pirates/'+pirateId).then(function(res){successCall();});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:deletePirate,className:"btn btn-danger ms-4",children:"Walk the Plank!"});};export default DeleteButton;
